attributes.action: No Increase in the cost of Alcohol
attributes.additional_details: An Increase in the cost of Alcohol  per unit is detrementle to the people who can least afford an increase. People are being pushed into a cornor where one day enough is enough and it's now  taxes that are being used as excuses to safe guard peoples health is brought to an end. There needs to be a line drawn in the sand and the Goverment needs to hear the voice of the public they are there to serve and listen  to them. say No to Cost per Unit Increases
